segments.text: Ugh, that overflowing sink is making such a gross puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's streaming down the cabinets— what a filthy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she's just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Drying a plate with a towel while ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing for cookies, getting into who knows what crumbs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks dirty and unstable on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand is out, probably for sticky treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cookie jar— ants might come if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is tidy, unlike this sloppy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes near the water; they'll get ruined and moldy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's damp now, how unhygienic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this carelessness lead to such nastiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels unclean and chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR
